title: The Complete Guide to Rice Planting and Vegetable Harvesting: A Sustainable Farming Journey

subtasks: Plowing or tilling the soil
Incorporating organic matter into the soil
Leveling the field
Transplanting rice seedlings into the flooded field
Monitoring and managing water levels
Controlling weeds through natural means
Protecting against pests and diseases
Identifying the right time to harvest different types of vegetables
Using appropriate tools for harvesting (e.g., scissors, garden fork)
Preserving the harvested vegetables (drying, pickling, fermenting)
Reducing water usage through sustainable methods
Adopting organic farming practices
Sharing knowledge and techniques with other farmers
